about_the_game:
Attached is a 3D multiplayer survival game. You can build your kingdom with your friends or own yourself. But be careful other players can destroy your progress, eliminate them and be the one.

Story


Magic was an active force all over the kingdom. People used it to heal their wounds, fight against their enemies. However world is changing, Something started to spread called "Technology". Some people call it devil and others try to assimilate it. What do you believe Magic Or Tech?

More

Attached is a project that evolves with its player base. So please don't mind to contact developers. You can request a copy for your videos, give ideas and suggestions, report bugs etc..
  • For your main purposes, email us: contact@draculadev.com
  • For bugs and update callbacks, use feedback option in game's main menu
  • For talk any subjects with developers you can join our discord server:

Attached is a 3D multiplayer survival game. You can build your kingdom with your friends or own yourself. But be careful other players can destroy your progress, eliminate them and be the one.

Story


Magic was an active force all over the kingdom. People used it to heal their wounds, fight against their enemies. However world is changing, Something started to spread called "Technology". Some people call it devil and others try to assimilate it. What do you believe Magic Or Tech?

name: Attached

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for multiplayer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Core i5-8600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for multiplayer

However world is changing, Something started to spread called "Technology". Some people call it devil and others try to assimilate it. What do you believe Magic Or Tech?
